title: Reusable wood cutlery set
subTitle: Say no to disposable plastic cutlery

marketingArguments.title: Organic & reusable
marketingArguments.speech: This cutlery was designed to be eco-friendly, made of natural wood, fully respectful of nature and pollution-free. Take your set with you wherever you go. Reduce your use of plastic and the quantity of waste you produce every year with this cuttlery set.

marketingArguments.title: Easy to transport
marketingArguments.speech: The bag is made to follow you in your travels, carry it easily in your backpack or in your lunch box.

marketingArguments.title: Multiple usage
marketingArguments.speech: This wooden cutlery set can be used to cook, while camping, for picnics or for parties.

marketingArguments.title: Optimized pocket
marketingArguments.speech: Every object has a dedicated space to avoid bumping into other things.

packContent.description: Set 6 pcs: Spoon, Fork, Knife, Wood sticks, Straw brush, Bamboo Straw
Set 9 pcs: Spoon, Fork, Knife, Wood sticks, Straw brush, Bamboo Straw and toothbrush, Straight and curved steel straw

specifications.label: Material
specifications.value: Wood (Spoon, Fork, Knife, Toothbrush, Sticks, Straw), Stainless steel (Straight and curved straw, Straw brush)

specifications.label: Size
specifications.value: Spoon 20cm, Fork 20cm, Knife 20cm, Toothbrush 17.5cm, Bamboo straw 19.5cm, Sticks 20cm, Straight straw steel 21.5cm, Curved steel straw 21.5cm, Straw brush 20cm
